# init(style:)

**Initializer**

Creates an activity indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(style: UIActivityIndicatorView.Style)
```

## Parameters

- **style**: A constant that specifies the style of the object to be created. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/Style-swift.enum] for descriptions of the style constants.

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView] object.

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView] sizes the returned instance according to the specified `style`. You can set and retrieve the style of an activity indicator through the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/style-swift.property] property.

## Creating an activity indicator

- **init(frame:)**: Creates an activity indicator with the specified frame rectangle.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates an activity indicator from data in an unarchiver.
